verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] award a retired US Navy SEAL with the Medal of Honor in recognition of his actions during a 2002 clash with enemy combatants while serving in Afghanistan .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: award] [ARG2: a retired US Navy SEAL] [ARG1: with the Medal of Honor] [ARGM-CAU: in recognition of his actions during a 2002 clash with enemy combatants while serving in Afghanistan] .

President Donald Trump will award a retired US Navy SEAL with the Medal of Honor in recognition of his actions during a 2002 clash with enemy combatants while [V: serving] [ARGM-LOC: in Afghanistan] .
